prop.caption: name
prop.description: the name of the method. This name will be available on the rpc object as a javascript method.

prop.caption: callback
prop.description: the name of the method that handles the return of the call.

prop.caption: async
prop.description: whether the call is executed in the backround. Default is true. When set to false the application hangs while this call is executed.

prop.caption: caching
prop.description: whether the call is cached. Default is false. When set to true any call with the same data will return immediately with the cached result.

prop.caption: ignore-offline
prop.description: whether the method should not be stored for later execution when offline.

prop.caption: method-name
prop.description: the name sent to the server.

prop.caption: type
prop.description: the type of the returned data
